name: LEGS
description:
Legs! This was made between July 7th and August 1st for the Awfuljams.com Awful Summer Jam 2017.

Hit "F1" in game to see controls and gameplay hints at any point.

There is a skill ceiling in this game that involves figuring out how to vault yourself high into the sky and land strong kicks from above while betting against the timing of enemies.

NOTES FOR MAC & PC:

I highly recommend setting things to "fantastic quality" because I have no failsafe for if the water shaders decide not to work.
